overview: For this performance of Mahler's Symphony No. 3, recorded live in 2007 at the Congress and Concert Hall Lucerne, Claudio Abbado and the Lucerne Festival Orchestra are joined by the Arnold Schoenberg Chor and the TÃ¶lzer Knabenchor. The soloist is Anna Larsson.
title: Lucerne 2007: Abbado conducts Mahler 3rd Symphony
